name: STEPPA Model
description: The STEPPA Model is an emotional and goal-oriented coaching framework. It integrates emotions and values into the goal-setting process, helping clients develop clarity and motivation for sustainable change.

focus_area.title: What issue or area would you like to focus on?
focus_area.description: Identify the subject or area of focus

work_objective.title: What do you want to work on?
work_objective.description: Define what specifically needs to be worked on

goal_definition.title: What is your goal?
goal_definition.description: Set a clear target or goal

success_indicators.title: How will you know when you've achieved it?

connected_emotions.title: What emotions are connected to this goal?
connected_emotions.description: Explore emotions related to the goal

emotional_motivation.title: How do these emotions influence your motivation?

current_beliefs.title: What beliefs do you hold about this situation?

action_steps.title: What steps will you take to achieve this goal?
action_steps.description: Create a plan with specific steps

timeframe.title: What is the timeframe for achieving this?
timeframe.description: Set pace and timeline for goal achievement

progress_measurement.title: How will you measure progress?
progress_measurement.description: Define how progress will be tracked and measured

potential_adjustments.title: What adjustments might be necessary?
potential_adjustments.description: Consider what adaptations might be needed

action_commitments.title: What actions will you commit to?
